snippet.title: Gumball for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Apple II
Commodore 64


Game description:

As a worker of the "Sticky Sole Gumball Factory", your task is to get the gumballs in the proper wagon (blue gumball in the blue wagon, red gumball in the red wagon, etc.) and then you have to empty the wagons.

After you have reached your day's quota, you will get promoted to a higher position. Thus you will get an additional wagon, which makes the game harder.


What I think:

Really fun game. Although it might get repetitive...but hey, that's to be expected. ;)
